completion.item: <[!CDATA[Activates an item and notifies the selection listenerParameters: gara.jswt.TabItem item - the item to be activatedThrows: TypeError - if the item is not type of gara.jswt.TabItem ]]>
<[!CDATA[Adds an item to this tabfolderParameters: gara.jswt.TabItem item - the item to be addedThrows: TypeError - if the item is not type of gara.jswt.TabItem ]]>
<[!CDATA[Notifies selection listener about the changed selection within the List ]]>

<[!CDATA[Shows off the content for the client area from the passed itemParameters:
gara.jswt.TabItem item - the item with the content
				]]>
<[!CDATA[Register listeners for this widget. Implementation for gara.jswt.Widget ]]>
